title: Multiscales Convention
description: Schema for multiscale pyramid information in Zarr. Properties define the hierarchical layout and transformations.

layout.description: Array of objects representing the pyramid layout and transformation relationships

group.description: Group name for this resolution level

from_group.description: Source group used to generate this level

factors.description: Array of decimation factors per axis

scale.description: Array of scale factors per axis describing the resolution change

translation.description: Array of translation offsets per axis in the coordinate space

resampling_method.description: Resampling method for this specific level
Default resampling method used for downsampling
